item.description:
The North Shore Networkers, Topsfield's BNI Chapter, invites anyone interested in a fun, social evening of business networking to join us at Supino's Restaurant, 250 Newbury Street, Danvers, MA, February 8th at 6:00 p.m.

BNI, Business Networking International, is the world's largest networking organization and members benefit from sharing ideas, information and most importantly, business referrals. February 8th promises to be an excellent opportunity to meet other North Shore professionals interested in collaborative networking.

Bring plenty of business cards!


If you are unable to attend but interested in learning more about BNI specifically, please join us for our Chapter's Visitors' Day on Thursday morning, February 10th, at 7 a.m. in Topsfield. E-mail Christine Bolzan at christine@graduatecareercoaching.com for more information. We look forward to meeting you.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the North Shore Networkers
item.name: North Shore Networking
